title: What's Behind the Surge in Giving
description: Ann Limberg, head of philanthropic solutions at Bank of America Private Bank, and Una Osili, associate dean for research and international programs at Indiana University,  Lilly Family School of Philanthropy, speak with Barron's Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about a rise in giving by affluent Americans in 2020.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Ann Limberg, head of philanthropic solutions at Bank of America Private Bank, and Una Osili, associate dean for research and international programs at Indiana University,  Lilly Family School of Philanthropy, speak with Barron's Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about a rise in giving by affluent Americans in 2020.
content:encoded: Ann Limberg, head of philanthropic solutions at Bank of America Private Bank, and Una Osili, associate dean for research and international programs at Indiana University,  Lilly Family School of Philanthropy, speak with Barron's Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about a rise in giving by affluent Americans in 2020.
